## PopulatableEthersGivety.depositCollateral() method

Adjust existing Trove by depositing more collateral.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
depositCollateral(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedEthersGivetyTransaction<TroveAdjustmentDetails>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of collateral to add to the Trove's existing collateral. |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedEthersGivetyTransaction](./lib-ethers.populatedethersgivetytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ depositCollateral: amount })

```
